scripts.build:chrome: cross-env PLATFORM=chrome gulp clean && cross-env PLATFORM=chrome gulp build
scripts.build:firefox: cross-env PLATFORM=firefox gulp clean && cross-env PLATFORM=firefox gulp build
scripts.build:safari: cross-env PLATFORM=safari gulp clean && cross-env PLATFORM=safari gulp build
scripts.build:edge: cross-env PLATFORM=edge gulp clean && cross-env PLATFORM=edge gulp build
scripts.build: npm run build:chrome && npm run build:firefox && npm run build:edge
scripts.publish:chrome: npm run build:chrome && chrome-webstore-upload upload --source dist/build/chrome --auto-publish
scripts.publish:firefox: npm run build:firefox && cd dist/build/firefox && web-ext sign --channel listed
